entry.string:
%%myname%%,
Here is your new password for %%sitename%%. You may now login to %%siteurl%% using the following username and password:
username: %%username%% password: %%password%%
-- %%siteadmin%%
entry.translation: %%myname%%, Here is your new password for %%sitename%%. You may now login to %%siteurl%% using the following username and password: username: %%username%% password: %%password%% -- %%siteadmin%%
